name: Trainwreck
description: Trainwreck is a mind-bending hybrid with potent sativa effects that hit like a freight train. Mexican and Thai sativas were bred with Afghani indicas to produce this Northern California staple, passing on a sweet lemon and spicy pine aroma. Trainwreck begins its speedy hurtle through the mind with a surge of euphoria, awakening creativity and happiness. Migraines, pain, and arthritis are mowed down by Trainwreckâ€™s high THC content, and many patients also use it for relief of anxiety, ADD/ADHD, and PTSD. Trainwreck flowers finish up in early October outdoors, while indoor gardens are ready for harvest 8 weeks into flowering.
attributes_title: Happy, Euphoric, Relaxed, Uplifted, Energetic, Stress, Depression, Pain, Headaches, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Paranoid, Dizzy
